response.headline: RED° Tokyo Tower gaming experience featuring 1v1 robot boxing competition in Japan
response.summary: RED° Tokyo Tower in Minato City offers ultimate gaming experience including 1v1 robot fight competitions. The venue combines gaming with robotic entertainment for visitors to Tokyo.

extracted_text: This is your sign to go robot boxing in Tokyo
If you LOVE gaming and you're heading to Tokyo, you have to give RED Tokyo Tower a visit for the ultimate gaming experience. You can even compete in a 1v1 robot fight
image_details.key_interest: Robot boxing experience at RED° Tokyo Tower
visual_hierarchy: Robot boxing machine with red gloves
